grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 惨事【サンジ】disaster, tragedy, tragic incident, horrible accident
凄惨【セイサン】ghastly, gruesome, appalling, lurid
陰惨【インサン】sadness and gloom
残虐【ザンギャク】cruel, brutal, savage, barbarous
冷酷無惨【レイコクムザン】cruel and heartless, merciless, implacable, cold-blooded
kun reading compounds: 惨め【みじめ】miserable, wretched, unhappy, sad, pitiable
惨い【むごい】cruel, merciless, pitiless, brutal, atrocious, inhuman, tragic, horrible, terrible, dreadful, miserable
